title: Thank you for fixing the secondary pick as support
body: It no longer yields support ~80% of the time, I had adc/supp 4 times selected and got adc every time, then tried jg/supp and got my jg. So a big big thank you to Riot for finally fixing this.

replies.body:
Thanks for saying this, you're not alone in feeling thankful.

I know it sucks to really hate a role. But it's not fair that, just because you're picky, someone who's _not_ picky has to foot the bill constantly.
Oh I don't hate it, I just don't want it THAT often ;))

It's okay I meant, general 'you' for people >u<

once I went supp/fill and instantly got a game as mid
I thought It was the most popular role?
Some mid mains would give anything for an instant game.
I notice that this sort of thing happens more when people (as in other players, not me) either dodge or don't accept several matches in a row
I saw it happen to someone that doesn't dodge, qd for top/jg and got surprise mid o_O
Auto-fill is screwing things up. People are queuing for two roles, getting auto-filled into a third, and then learning that somebody on their own team got auto-filled into one of their two roles.
Yes, but the expense of this is permanently having autofill activated. I appreciate that supp secondary is usable, but it literally hurts everybody else not queueing for support
Yeah well, we could go oback to where nobody even queues support because they will get it every time.

Doing top/support with autofill active, expecting to support, but I get top more often now.
It might be because I'm queueing as solo in flex queue (thus more supports in queue), though.
